title: Fireside with the Underboss - "She Called Me a Child Killer Then She Spit on Me"
description: Sammy tells us the unique story about how he got drafted and transported to South Carolina. The experiences he has before, during, and after basic training paint the picture of what so many soldiers went through during the Vietnam war.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy tells us the unique story about how he got drafted and transported to South Carolina. The experiences he has before, during, and after basic training paint the picture of what so many soldiers went through during the Vietnam war.
